00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.AddForeignKeyConstraintStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.ForeignKey;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00010 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00013 
00014 import java.util.HashSet;
00015 import java.util.Set;
00016 
00020 public class AddForeignKeyConstraintChange extends AbstractChange {
00021     private String baseTableSchemaName;
00022     private String baseTableName;
00023     private String baseColumnNames;
00024 
00025     private String referencedTableSchemaName;
00026     private String referencedTableName;
00027     private String referencedColumnNames;
00028 
00029     private String constraintName;
00030 
00031     private Boolean deferrable;
00032     private Boolean initiallyDeferred;
00033 
00034     private Boolean deleteCascade;
00035 
00036     public AddForeignKeyConstraintChange() {
00037         super("addForeignKeyConstraint", "Add Foreign Key Constraint");
00038     }
00039 
00040     public String getBaseTableSchemaName() {
00041         return baseTableSchemaName;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public void setBaseTableSchemaName(String baseTableSchemaName) {
00045         this.baseTableSchemaName = baseTableSchemaName;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public String getBaseTableName() {
00049         return baseTableName;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public void setBaseTableName(String baseTableName) {
00053         this.baseTableName = baseTableName;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public String getBaseColumnNames() {
00057         return baseColumnNames;
00058     }
00059 
00060     public void setBaseColumnNames(String baseColumnNames) {
00061         this.baseColumnNames = baseColumnNames;
00062     }
00063 
00064     public String getReferencedTableSchemaName() {
00065         return referencedTableSchemaName;
00066     }
00067 
00068     public void setReferencedTableSchemaName(String referencedTableSchemaName) {
00069         this.referencedTableSchemaName = referencedTableSchemaName;
00070     }
00071 
00072     public String getReferencedTableName() {
00073         return referencedTableName;
00074     }
00075 
00076     public void setReferencedTableName(String referencedTableName) {
00077         this.referencedTableName = referencedTableName;
00078     }
00079 
00080     public String getReferencedColumnNames() {
00081         return referencedColumnNames;
00082     }
00083 
00084     public void setReferencedColumnNames(String referencedColumnNames) {
00085         this.referencedColumnNames = referencedColumnNames;
00086     }
00087 
00088     public String getConstraintName() {
00089         return constraintName;
00090     }
00091 
00092     public void setConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00093         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00094     }
00095 
00096     public Boolean getDeferrable() {
00097         return deferrable;
00098     }
00099 
00100     public void setDeferrable(Boolean deferrable) {
00101         this.deferrable = deferrable;
00102     }
00103 
00104     public Boolean getInitiallyDeferred() {
00105         return initiallyDeferred;
00106     }
00107 
00108     public void setInitiallyDeferred(Boolean initiallyDeferred) {
00109         this.initiallyDeferred = initiallyDeferred;
00110     }
00111 
00112 
00113     public Boolean getDeleteCascade() {
00114         return deleteCascade;
00115     }
00116 
00117     public void setDeleteCascade(Boolean deleteCascade) {
00118         this.deleteCascade = deleteCascade;
00119     }
00120 
00121     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00122         boolean deferrable = false;
00123         if (getDeferrable() != null) {
00124             deferrable = getDeferrable();
00125         }
00126 
00127         boolean initiallyDeferred = false;
00128         if (getInitiallyDeferred() != null) {
00129             initiallyDeferred = getInitiallyDeferred();
00130         }
00131 
00132         boolean deleteCascade = false;
00133         if (getDeleteCascade() != null) {
00134             deleteCascade = getDeleteCascade();
00135         }
00136         
00137         return new SqlStatement[]{
00138                 new AddForeignKeyConstraintStatement(getConstraintName(),
00139                         getBaseTableSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getBaseTableSchemaName(),
00140                         getBaseTableName(),
00141                         getBaseColumnNames(),
00142                         getReferencedTableSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getReferencedTableSchemaName(),
00143                         getReferencedTableName(),
00144                         getReferencedColumnNames())
00145                 .setDeferrable(deferrable)
00146                 .setInitiallyDeferred(initiallyDeferred)
00147                 .setDeleteCascade(deleteCascade)
00148         };
00149     }
00150 
00151     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00152         DropForeignKeyConstraintChange inverse = new DropForeignKeyConstraintChange();
00153         inverse.setBaseTableSchemaName(getBaseTableSchemaName());
00154         inverse.setBaseTableName(getBaseTableName());
00155         inverse.setConstraintName(getConstraintName());
00156 
00157         return new Change[]{
00158                 inverse
00159         };
00160     }
00161 
00162     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00163         return "Foreign key contraint added to " + getBaseTableName() + " (" + getBaseColumnNames() + ")";
00164     }
00165 
00166     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00167         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00168 
00169         if (getBaseTableSchemaName() != null) {
00170             node.setAttribute("baseTableSchemaName", getBaseTableSchemaName());
00171         }
00172 
00173         node.setAttribute("baseTableName", getBaseTableName());
00174         node.setAttribute("baseColumnNames", getBaseColumnNames());
00175         node.setAttribute("constraintName", getConstraintName());
00176 
00177         if (getReferencedTableSchemaName() != null) {
00178             node.setAttribute("referencedTableSchemaName", getReferencedTableSchemaName());
00179         }
00180         node.setAttribute("referencedTableName", getReferencedTableName());
00181         node.setAttribute("referencedColumnNames", getReferencedColumnNames());
00182 
00183         if (getDeferrable() != null) {
00184             node.setAttribute("deferrable", getDeferrable().toString());
00185         }
00186 
00187         if (getInitiallyDeferred() != null) {
00188             node.setAttribute("initiallyDeferred", getInitiallyDeferred().toString());
00189         }
00190 
00191         if (getDeleteCascade() != null) {
00192             node.setAttribute("deleteCascade", getDeleteCascade().toString());
00193         }
00194         return node;
00195     }
00196 
00197     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00198         Set<DatabaseObject> returnSet = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00199 
00200         Table baseTable = new Table(getBaseTableName());
00201         returnSet.add(baseTable);
00202 
00203         for (String columnName : getBaseColumnNames().split(",")) {
00204             Column baseColumn = new Column();
00205             baseColumn.setTable(baseTable);
00206             baseColumn.setName(columnName.trim());
00207 
00208             returnSet.add(baseColumn);
00209         }
00210 
00211         Table referencedTable = new Table(getReferencedTableName());
00212         returnSet.add(referencedTable);
00213 
00214         for (String columnName : getReferencedColumnNames().split(",")) {
00215             Column referencedColumn = new Column();
00216             referencedColumn.setTable(baseTable);
00217             referencedColumn.setName(columnName.trim());
00218 
00219             returnSet.add(referencedColumn);
00220         }
00221 
00222         ForeignKey fk = new ForeignKey();
00223         fk.setName(constraintName);
00224         fk.setForeignKeyTable(baseTable);
00225         fk.setForeignKeyColumns(baseColumnNames);
00226         fk.setPrimaryKeyTable(referencedTable);
00227         fk.setPrimaryKeyColumns(referencedColumnNames);
00228         returnSet.add(fk);
00229 
00230         return returnSet;
00231 
00232     }
00233
